title: Heaven Help Me, Or Hell Have Me
description: This book is no longer in print.Kassie is used to the everyday bad luck occurrences plaguing her life. Tried and true to her nature, she has learned to smile and forge forward with her own personal mantra in mind: Heaven help me, or Hell have me. But after a particularly bad day, even her mantra can't help, and her luck takes a turn. Though, whether it be for the best remains to be seen.NOTE: This book is a novelette.
author: Jolyn Palliata
